item.title: CVE-2024-37961|2024-07-22T13:35:21.334Z -- codoc.jp -- codoc
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in codoc.Jp allows Stored XSS.This issue affects codoc: from n/a through 0.9.51.12.
